short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension made to show the number of tabs you currently have open!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The inspiration came from the tab counter on the mobile version of chrome, which I found very useful, so I thought why not make one for desktop!
